title: Emergency childbirth
creator_credit: Paul Burnford and Paul Burnford Educational Films
brief_description: This film utilises actual birth footage along with animation, models and live-action in order to demonstrate the two main steps you will take in an emergency childbirth, ie evaluating the situation and assisting the delivery. In this instance the emergency birth is taking place in a park.
